meanings.definition: A person who operates or works on a train.
meanings.sent1: The trainman waved to the passengers as the train departed.
meanings.sent2: The trainman checked the tickets of all the travelers on board.
meanings.sent3: The trainman pretended to be a ticket inspector for his little sister's toy train.
meanings.sent4: The trainman's dedication to his job was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The trainman's uniform made him easily recognizable among the crowd.

meanings.definition: A man who is employed in the operation of a train.
meanings.sent1: After years of training, the trainman became an expert in handling locomotives.
meanings.sent2: The trainman skillfully navigated the train through the winding tracks.
meanings.sent3: The trainman joked that his favorite song was 'Locomotion' because it reminded him of work.
meanings.sent4: The trainman's precision in timing was as reliable as the train schedule itself.
meanings.sent5: The trainman's passion for trains was evident in every aspect of his work.
